name: Farewell, Eikon (Demo)
description:
Farewell, Eikon is an unconventional turn-based RPG that forgoes random encounters and levels and instead focuses on boss fights and stat-altering equipment.

Synopsis:

Sleeping on the job, running out of ice cream, and being locked out of his hometown due to a storm. Things just can't seem to go right for Jack. With no other way to get home, he finds himself on a journey across the country of Telos. Stumbling into enemies and allies alike as he looks for a way back.

Features:

- Gameplay focused on overworld exploration and unique encounters

- A battle system based on positioning and resource management.

- A strange plot with an even stranger cast of characters.

- A whole lot of dialogue.

Credits:

Developer/Sprites/Writer: @Lapouris_.
Music: @korschar.
Backgrounds/Portraits: @Rukiiuu.

This demo is a proof-of-concept and may not be a accurate representation of the final game. If you find any bugs please feel free to comment here, or send me an email at lapourisdev@gmail.com
